name: Get twelve!
description:
This game seems easy, but you need a strategy to win.

HOW TO PLAY :
Tap a tile, then tap another one with the same number. They will merge into one tile with incremented number if there is a path between them.
Try to get 12, or even higher!

FEATURES:
· Endless challenge
· Easy to play, hard to master
· Simple and colorful design

Compete with other players in Game Center!
